lore.confetti_stuff.party_popper: An item that releases confetti when used. It packs quite a punch!
lore.confetti_stuff.broom: A tool used to clean up leftover confetti.
lore.confetti_stuff.confetti_cannon: A block that releases confetti when supplied with Redstone Power.
lore.confetti_stuff.confetti_layer: A pile of large pieces of confetti.
